short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An easy way to send messages to your Discord Server from the Web Browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple extention to announce things to your Discord Server quickly and seamlessly from Chrome, you enter a Webhook URL and it is saved in your settings and you will be able to quickly announce things to your server from Chrome.
